data.actual_result: Clicking on it takes us to the default (top) channel
data.expected_result: It shouldn't be highlighted in the first place as on desktop. Clicking on it should do nothing.
data.short_description: Clicking on a mentioned category in chat jumps to the default channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Long press on a category name - Copy the ID - Mention the category in chat using it's ID (<#ID>) - Click on the highlighted category
